intro.p: This node converts columns from the new date&time data types to the old type.

tab.name: Column Selection
tab.option: Only the included columns will be converted.

option.name: Add the offset of the time zone to the time
option.p: If the first option is selected, the offset of the time zone will be added to the time. Otherwise the time zone information will be just dropped, because the legacy Date&Type type does not support time zones.

Example:
Input:
2015-07-09T13:00:00+02:00[Europe/Berlin]
Output if first option is selected:
09.Jul.2015 15:00:00
Output if second option is selected:
09.Jul.2015 13:00:00

ports.outPort: Output table containing the converted columns.
